LightningComponentBundle.description: Display at-a-glance visual representations of status, values, and key details about a record.

property.name: titleStyle
property.label: Title Style
property.description: Choose the Title Style: Standard Lightning Card or a style to match Dynamic Forms.

property.name: showTitle
property.label: Display Title
property.description: Display the Indicator's Title on the component.

property.name: showDescription
property.label: Display Description
property.description: Display the Indicator's Description on the component.

property.name: showRefresh
property.label: Show refresh button
property.description: Enable an admin button to refresh the values.

property.name: mappedField
property.label: (Optional) Mapped Id Field
property.description: (Optional) Instead of using the current Record Id, provide the API Name of a field (Case Sensitive) on this object which holds a Record Id or Relationship Id to use that value.

property.name: showFooter
property.label: Show footer when using Mapped Id Field
property.description: Enable a footer to show what mapped field is being used.
